com.ikalagaming.core

Class NodeSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.core.NodeSettings

  • public class NodeSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Configurable settings that allow changing the behavior of the node system.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DISABLE_ON_UNLOAD
      If nodes should be disabled when they are unloaded.
      static boolean ENABLE_ON_LOAD
      If nodes should be enabled when they are loaded.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS
      If the node manager should use events for altering nodes.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_DISABLE
      True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes disable method.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ENABLE
      True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes enable method.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_LOAD
      True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes onLoad method.
      static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_UNLOAD

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ENABLE_ON_LOAD

        public static boolean ENABLE_ON_LOAD
        If nodes should be enabled when they are loaded. If this is false then nodes must be enabled manually after they are loaded.

      • DISABLE_ON_UNLOAD

        public static boolean DISABLE_ON_UNLOAD
        If nodes should be disabled when they are unloaded. If this is false then nodes would have to disable themselves in the unload methods or not need to disable before unloading.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS
        If the node manager should use events for altering nodes. False if they should be loaded, unloaded, disabled, etc using direct function calls. If false, this may cause slower loading/unloading but would ensure the nodes receive the commands immediately/directly. Each type of alteration has its own individual setting if this is true.
        If no event system is available, defaults to direct access.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_LOAD

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_LOAD
        True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes onLoad method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_UNLOAD

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ON_UNLOAD
        True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes onUnload method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_ENABLE

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_ENABLE
        True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes enable method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

      • USE_EVENTS_FOR_DISABLE

        public static boolean USE_EVENTS_FOR_DISABLE
        True if the node manager should use an event to call the nodes disable method. False if it should call directly. Has no effect if USE_EVENTS_FOR_ACCESS is false.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeSettings

        public NodeSettings()
